title:
Why can I no longer get wway and wect local news in high definition and full screen on my TV and what is happening with Time Warner that my channels have suddenly changed???  Retro TV has disappeared???



Thanks

R Jenkins
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20131006/ARTICLES/131009775/1177?Title=Retro-TV-no-longer-available-on-Time-Warner I get the local news from those stations full-screen and in high definition, so you might check your settings or call your cable provider.
